headline.main: British Woman, 60, Wins Legal Round in Fight to Give Birth to Grandchild

snippet: A British appeals court handed a legal victory to a woman who wants to fulfill her daughter’s dying wish: to have her mother carry her baby and raise the child....
lead_paragraph: A British appeals court handed a legal victory to a woman who wants to fulfill her daughter’s dying wish: to have her mother carry her baby and raise the child.
